Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that President Obama has started confiscating guns "by force" when there is no evidence to support this claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to back up the assertion that President Obama is confiscating guns by force.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that a California law allowing family members to obtain temporary restraining orders for relatives in a mental health crisis is linked to President Obama and his alleged gun confiscation.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the California law mentioned in the claim is not related to President Obama and his actions.
